Name: Dreamals: Dream Quest
About the game: There is a world of dreams called Dreamland, where anyone can have their wishes granted. Three wounded and homeless animals happened to enter Dreamland. Will they be able to find the lost treasures of Dreamland and save the world? “And will their wishes to regain their health and go back home safely come true?” Features - Innovative Action Puzzle Game: Each animal moves in set direction. Combined animals can move in more directions. You can also separate combined animals! Find the perfect places to combine or separate animals and clear stages quickly! - Over 30 exciting Trap tiles - 6 themes and 100 well-designed stages
